name: Classic Vegas Slots-Best Slots
description:
Classic Vegas Slots for iOS is a free slots app featuring some of the best slot machine and casino games in Las Vegas. The fun slot machines bring Vegas action to the palm of your hand!

Classic Vegas Slots offers the following features:

• Ability to play slot machines on your mobile phone anywhere you can get online
• 500-coin bonus as a huge welcome
• Daily Present Picker: Open boxes for wheel markers
• 100 coins awarded each hour
• Nine classic casino slot machine games, including 3 Reelers
• Las Vegas-style slots like Billionaire Club, Lucky Re-spin, and Beach Party
• Option to bet more to level up faster
• Five-minute games and tournaments with online players from around the world
• Chance to be the best – place in the top three to claim fun prizes
• Option to buy extra coins for just 99 cents of your own money

Download Classic Vegas Slots to your mobile iOS device or phone today!


The game does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or real prizes. This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only. Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
